coded_answer.p: I have visitedvisited your theatertheatre and I was very dissapointeddisappointed because offor thea number of reasons.

There was no Danny Brook but instead of him there was a different actor and I'm very dissapointeddisappointed about itthat because I'm his fana fan of his. It was a realyreally bad evening and because of itthat could you possibly give me my money back? Because it was just a waste of money to gogoing to your show.

Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. But when I came to this school a few months ago I didn't know this. We are in the same maths set so I met him rather soon. He was one of the first people who I getgot knowto know. After a few days he was already my best friend. Everything was going perfectly beforbefore last month when I met a girl from the other school. Her name was Marine. I saw her as a perfect girl with whowhom I fallenhad fallen in love with. So one day she offeredinvited to me to come to her house at night and to do so I had to run away from our boarding house and that was illigalillegal. I had decided to go. So I woke up at 2 o'clock in the morning and climedclimbed out of the window. Unfortunately for me Pat at the time wentwas going to the toilet and saw me. So I asked him to keep it ina secret. I came back at 6 o'clock in the morning and went to sleep again. Next day my best friend went to the headmaster and told him about me so he gaveput me aon sespendsuspension.
